system.description:
When you watch someone's back and keep your eyes peeled, you can roll to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.aFNAJFmoqfsOHOB8]{Overcome} any harm against them with +Sense instead of +Blood.

When you attempt to avoid, redirect, or prevent the harm something will cause, roll +Blood. You can Overcome any obstacle, threat, Cut, or Move made against you or an ally, if you are in position to act and have the means to stop it.

Overcoming harm with a weapon does not cost Ammo.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: The Overlord gets to make a Cut against you!

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
Choose one:

Pay a price to take the 10+ result, or create a temporary solution. A temporary solution will delay the threat, but when time is up, it'll be back in force - the Overlord will tell you when.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You stop the obstacle, threat, Cut, or Move from causing harm.
